content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection supports Dynamic URL scanning for Teams Chat March 22, 2024—Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection supports dynamic URL scanning for Teams Chat to further analyzes URLs posted in chats in real-time to detect phishing URLs. metadata.title: Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection supports Dynamic URL scanning for Teams Chat
